Container.Name: JobAppRazorWeb
Container.Overview: ASP.NET Razor app with SQLite database persistence
Container.Description: JobAppRazorWeb container running a Blazor/Razor web interface with a persistent SQLite database. Ensure your SQLite file path points to a valid Unraid share so data survives container updates.

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: Port used to access the Job Tracker web interface (e.g. http://serverip:31300)

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Directory mapped inside the container for app configuration and runtime files. Recommended: keep under /mnt/user/appdata/ for easy backup.

Config.Name: External Database Directory
Config.Description: External folder to store SQLite database file. The app expects /db/jobs.sqlite.

Config.Name: DB_PATH
Config.Description: Environment variable for the database file path inside the container
